output.sentences: There was once a vehicle as aerodynamic as a box.
A bookmobile? No a mobile home filled with invisible zombies only being stopped by a glass door with a misleading sign.
"How the hay did you manage to keep those zombies out Lurlene?" asked Beatrice.

She chuckled and the camera fades to a flashback with Lurlene narrating her recollection "I had a pow wow with the printing department and we concurred; make a sign that reads Push, when in fact you should actually Pull."

"Say what!?" said Quincy. "You heard me." said Lurlene as her flashback manifested via telecommunications. Quincy, trying to maintain composure, but betrayed by his trembling voice, calmly panicked utters in disbelief. "But the door, I had Charles change the hinge last week. Now it's dual action. I can be made to open by Push. And. Pull." Cut to Black.
